thread.title: Resmed records small profit lift

title: Resmed records small profit lift
text:
Fri, Jul 31, 2015, 11:22 AM NZST - New Zealand Markets close in 5 hrs 38 mins Resmed records small profit lift AAP â€“ 4 minutes 25 seconds ago Recommend Print 
Medical device maker ResMed has recorded a small lift in full year profit after the rising US dollar hurt revenue from its European and Asia Pacific operations and weighed on its profit margins. 
The Australian-listed company, which specialises in sleep disorder products, recorded a net profit of $US353 million ($A484.03 million) for the 12 months to June 30, up two per cent from $US345 million for the same period a year ago. 
Revenue from the company's US business was up 27 per cent during the fourth quarter, but down 10 per cent from its European and Asian Pacific operations due to currency fluctuations, which also resulted in lower profit margins. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook % Chg Your most recently viewed tickers will automatically show up here if you type a ticker in the "Enter symbol/company" at the bottom of this module.
